title: Skypunch
description: I've shattered the barrier between time and space, I've been to the Axis of Time,- the place where time itself stands still- and I've beheld the vastness of the great Multiverse, the roof under which infinite worlds reside.Now, having been thrust into time at the hands of a deranged madman, I must brave the perils of a treacherous dystopia if I'm ever to make it back home...and save the people I love.
author: Logan Castle
